lensconstruction: 15 elements in 10 groups (including 1 superED glass element, 2 ED glass elements, and 3 aspheric elements)
mediatype: optional Memory Stick Duo (No movie recording), optional Memory Stick PRO Duo (Mark 2 only for movie recording), optional Memory Stick PRO-HG Duo , optional SD Memory Card (Class 4 or higher), optional SDHC Memory Card (Class 4 or higher), optional SDXC Memory Card (Class 4 or higher)
